title: The Island
description: Volume 1 of the Colony Z series!When the Undead have taken over America, one group of survivors find safety by escaping to a remote, unsettled island.There they work to rebuild society, while trying to survive whatever it is that is after them.Alone and isolated, their relative peace and safety is shattered when a group of Others shows up on their island and their leaders must make life-altering choices in the blink of an eye.This is only the beginning. This is their story.
author: Luke Shephard
